body.name: Simple Designs LD1002-BLU Gooseneck Organizer Desk Lamp with iPad Tablet Stand Book Holder, Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 26 mins
features: MODERN & FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: This lamp's modern aesthetics, coupled with its practical functionality, make it a standout addition to any workspace. Optimize efficiency with this great selection for your office, bedroom, nightstand, or library.
CONVENIENT SWITCH: An easily accessible rocker switch is located on the base of the lamp to allow a quick and easy on/off function as needed.
PRODUCT SIZE: This lamp is L: 6.5" x W: 6.5" x H: 18.5" and weighs 1.59 lbs.
NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: This product ships assembled and will only require you to install the required light bulb before use (not included in your purchase).

BULB REQUIREMENT: This lamp uses 1 x 40 watt equivalent type A15 E26 medium base bulb (not included) *Note: Short CFL or energy saving bulb is recommended for maximum light output. 13W CFL bulb is equivalent to a 60W incandescent.
ADDITIONAL OPTIONS AVAILABLE: Additional finishes are available. If this finish doesn't perfectly match your space, make sure to check out other options!
body.description: Style and functionality meet with this fun organizer desk lamp. It is beautifully finished and comes equipped to hold many of the important essentials needed in a desk organizer. The flexible chrome gooseneck allows you to point the light exactly where you need it. ON/OFF flip switch is located on the base for convenience. The organizer includes 8 compartments for storing pens, pencils, paper clips, etc. It also have a spot to rest your iPad, book, or notebook for easy viewing. Perfect for offices, kids rooms, or college dorms!

Organizer includes 8 compartments for storing pens, pencils, paper clips, etc. It also has a spot to rest your iPad, book, or notebook for easy viewing. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk lamp...priced right!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a really old desk lamp that just died on me which had similar little dividers (like my old one) to house things I used on my scrapbooking table and just used my mini CFL lightbulb that I already had. I like the on/off button and the gooseneck which can be adjusted to suit your lighting needs. It can also hold your cellphone/tablet which I really don't need to do, but is useful to have it. It was delivered the next day (with Prime) and packaged in the product box which was inside a cardboard box so it was well protected from damage. It's a great price $14.59+tax plus free shipping with Prime and looks just like the pictures. I would recommend it highly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I saw this lamp on your website I knew I had to have it. Excellent quality and the price was perfect. Thanks I love it on my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good lamp, good price, just make sure you READ the instructions!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this lamp for the desk I recently purchased, and I have to say I like it very much. I read a lot of the reviews on here saying how lamps were melted and broken within a few weeks or even one day of use, but I also read many that said they were using the wrong (or otherwise unspecified) light bulb in the lamp. I was confident I could follow directions, so I took a chance and ordered it anyhow. Mine came in orange, and I love the color.I went to the local Walmart to find a bulb and this is the reason it's 4 instead of 5 stars: I had a lot of trouble finding the right size. It specifies 15W MAXIMUM for the bulb, but most of the 15W bulbs were night light sized. I wanted to make sure to get a LED bulb as well; I read those give off less heat and are more energy efficient. The only trouble was that there were several types, and I wasn't sure exactly how to convert a normal 15W bulb to a LED type bulb, since the packaging states that they use far less than 15W to run a "60W equivalent" (or less, there was a variety). I ended up purchasing a GE 60W Replacement, that runs on 11W. I figured I would try it out and if it melted my lamp or didn't work or fit, I would just be out a little money and I would buy a different lamp I could fit the bulb into directly from Walmart. When I brought it home and put it in the lamp, I kept a very close eye on it to make sure it wasn't getting warm or making the shade warp in any way, and I'm happy to report it was fine, even after 3 hours of use that night and a few hours (at minimum) per day since then, and it is running fine and not warped, melted, or broken in any way.Make sure you READ the instructions and FOLLOW them, and this product should work just fine. It comes in nice colors, and it is a good size to fit on a desk that doesn't have much space. (Mine is a compact desk, so the organizer area was just a huge bonus to help me keep my things in order.) There isn't a ton of room in the organizer compartments, but it's nice that it holds a tablet or a large smartphone so you can watch things on the side of your desk if you are working at the computer.Overall I like this product and I would order it again! If I could make one change, it would only be adding a chart to the instructions to convert different types of bulbs so you know what to buy. That was a bit of a pain, but worth it in the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute and multi functional lamp
reviews.reviewText: I love the storage space it has, and it's super cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lamp! My last lamp did not have a replaceable bulb, and I had to toss it. I love that it holds all my post it notes and correction fluid, as other things as well. But as you can see, I get a lot of use out of that space that holds my tablet at a decent angle so I can watch Amazon Prime while using my laptop. I highly recommend this lamp. It's well worth the bargain price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great product. It works well in my office.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. It works well in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This light is awful! The first one came completely broken into many pieces. The second one came "complete" however the cord component inside the lamp shakes all over the place and is very loud if bumped. The shade looks cracked but it's just a flaw in the acrylic. When you turn on the lamp you notice that the shade isn't entirely one color. We got the blue one and the lamp shade is blue, green, and yellow...it's supposed to be all blue so it's a cosmetic hot mess. Don't waste your time or money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for my needs
reviews.reviewText: The lamp is very cute, works great, and has handy compartments for things like pens, etc.

Sturdy, excellent organizer as well for pencils, pens etc... The lime green color tied in perfectly to my son's lime green bean bag chair, he loves his lamp. Gives off a great light on his desk when completing homework.

Love that it comes in so many colors. Perfect for a desk. Can get really hot which can be an issue with kids but otherwise happy with this lamp. Orange can be hard to find so glad this was available in a cool color.

La lampara tiene un lindo diseño y con el foco adecuado ilumina bastante bien. Sus compartimientos no son de lo más grande, pero es perfecta para útiles o herramientas para manualidades. El plástico del que esta hecho es un poco frágil así que recomiendo tenerla en un lugar firme en donde sea complicado poder tirarla. Este mismo plástico hace que solo se le puedan poner focos led porque uno convencional puede derretir el plástico por el calor. Si la encuentran en oferta es una excelente opción para iluminar el escritorio aunque sin oferta sigue teniendo un gran valor.

Es muy bonita, adecuada para un escritorio, además que me encanta que tiene otros compartimientos para la tablet, celular entre otras cosas, puede ajustarse, funciona muy bien, el color es un poquito más fuerte al de la imagen pero no cambia mucho
The brightness is good and it does the job. I like the switch at the top. The thing is that it looks very cheap and childish. I got it on sale so I kept it.
